metadata.title: Die in the Dungeon - A Unique Dice-based Roguelite Game
metadata.description: Explore Die in the Dungeon, a unique deck-building roguelite where dice replace cards. Conquer the dungeon's many challenges and rise as the ultimate frog hero.
metadata.keywords: Die in the Dungeon, deck-building, roguelite, dice game, froggy adventure, dungeon crawler, turn-based strategy

hero.p: Die in the Dungeon is an innovative deck-building roguelite where your strength lies in the roll of the dice. Take on the 2X-floor dungeon and prove your mettle!

gameFeatures.title: Features of Die in the Dungeon
features: Engage in dice-based combat in a deck-building rogue adventure.
Collect unique relics to enhance your strategic advantage.
Experience an all-new event system with varied encounters.
Face off against new enemies and challenging bosses.
Discover numerous dice types and properties for limitless strategies.

gameplayInstructions.title: How to Play Die in the Dungeon
instructions: Start by choosing your dice to build your deck.
Roll the dice to attack, defend, or use special abilities.
Plan your moves carefully and anticipate enemy reactions.
Gather relics and new dice to increase your power.
Navigate through complex dungeon layouts while overcoming foes.

questions.question: What is Die in the Dungeon?
questions.answer: Die in the Dungeon is a deck-building, turn-based roguelite where you use dice instead of traditional cards to progress through the dungeon.

questions.question: How do I install Die in the Dungeon?
questions.answer: You can download Die in the Dungeon for Windows, macOS, and Linux from platforms like Steam and Itch.io.

questions.question: What are the system requirements?
questions.answer: The game is available for HTML5, Windows, macOS, and Linux and requires basic system specifications for optimal performance.

questions.question: Is there a multiplayer mode?
questions.answer: Currently, Die in the Dungeon is a single-player experience with no plans for multiplayer.

questions.question: Can I use a controller?
questions.answer: The game primarily supports mouse input, but there may be additional options for control as development progresses.

questions.question: How can I report a bug or give feedback?
questions.answer: Join our Discord server to report issues or share feedback directly with the developers.
